item.title: My eating disorder
item.author: Felix Editor,Conchi Hermida Sánchez,
item.description: As part of Eating Disorders Awareness Week, I would like to share my personal experience and hopefully help someone out there. “You are going to get fat.” ”Don’t let yourself go as I did.” “Remember: a moment on the lips is a lifetime on the hips”. These are all expressions I have been hearing at …
